about_the_game:
A look at the stars twinkling in the clear night sky can amaze children and grown men alike. But what mysteries lie beyond the edges of our planet? Fly into the adventure and exploration of deep space with Discovered Space Planets!

Whether you're looking for a powerful ambient piece for your rocking space opera or prefer a slower space melody for those quiet moments of exploration, Discovered Space Planets won't disappoint! Featuring a musical combination of modern and futuristic sound, each theme is unique while still a part of a larger narrative. Several themes include vocalizations, there to add a dramatic or spiritual touch. Created by Bittersweet Entertainment, this pack is a must-have addition to your growing library of resources.

Features:
  • 22 BGM themes covering the depths of space.
  • Material fitting a vast variety of moods and scenes.
  • .M4A and .OGG formats.
  • Tested in and formatted for use in RPG Maker MV.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: RPG Maker MV - Discovered Space Planets

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

short_description: What mysteries lie beyond the edges of our planet? Fly into the adventure and exploration of deep space with Discovered Space Planets!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese
